titleStmt.title: Linceus spectacles. Written by Lodowicke Lloid Esquire
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, Lodowick, fl. 1573-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, dwelling neere Holborne bridge,

notesStmt.note: In this state the dedication begins on A2r and goes for three leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Identified as STC 16623a on UMI microfilm.
